timeline.message:
CLDR-14251 Modernize: eliminate ajax_status.jsp

-Move most of ajax_status.jsp to SurveyAjax.includeJavaScript, converting jsp to java

-New CldrStatus.js to encapsulate data like surveyRunningStamp on front end with getters/setters

-TEMPORARY SurveyAjax.includeEvilJavaScript for items not yet handled by CldrStatus.js

-Extend statusJSON to include contextPath

-Remove unused front-end variables surveyCurrentLocaleStamp, surveyCurrentLocaleStampId, etc.

-Remove dead code; clean up

-Remove two ancient .DS_Store files that should never have been added to git

-Comments

timeline.bodyText: Oops WHAT_GETROW is accidentally duplicated here. It's harmless but I'll remove it in the next PR.
timeline.author: btangmu

replies.bodyText: these WHAT_ things shouldn't need to be communicated to the client… hard coded would be fine. But no reason to change it now.

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if these r instances should be hoisted up, since they are almost always used.  BUt, not really important.

replies.bodyText: I agree it's too much duplication. processRequest is over 700 lines, so nontrivial to refactor. When we do, good idea to consolidate calls to newJSONStatus
